title: Sampler, 1790
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross and stem stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Bands of pattern at top, then alphabets, three motifs including two women spinning and one monkey, crucifixion and Adam and Eve.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1790.
1790. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross and stem stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-278.
